name: Sparkplug
slogan: Taking ideas from concept through to production and market
description:
We are a London based innovation lab with a focus on data-driven solutions, assisting SMEs, organisations and early stage technology focused founders in building and evolving their business innovations. 

Our services covers multiple parallels including business analysis, concept design, branding, product development and management.

We are pragmatic and work to deliver products/services that solve real problems and deliver real value to your customers.
marketTags: B2B · SaaS · Mobile · Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning

jobs.title: Business Development & Sales Partner (Commission Only)
jobs.description:
Sparkplug is a remote innovation lab with a focus on data-driven solutions, assisting SMEs, organisations and early stage technology focused founders in building and evolving their business innovations.

We are currently expanding our partner network and seeking top-notch business development & sales partners to grow with us.

**Our goals:**
1. To expand partnership network by attracting new partners and clients.
2. To introduce our services to new markets.
3. To increase demand and promote our services

**Who are we looking for**
We’re not looking for employees. We’re not hiring you to do a job. You don’t need to be an expert in software products to work with us, experience in sales and useful business connections is enough to join Sparkplug.

We’re looking for our partners to have a curious and creative mind, and be eager to understand the principles of product development.

You are a passionate and enthusiastic individual who would like to use his/her/their personal sales, marketing, and business development expertise and is open to gathering new experience.

Someone who is flexible and able to take customers through the whole sales process.

In a perfect world, you’d cover all the sales stages, negotiate the cost and participate in all sales communication, so we provide just technical assistance, estimation, and offer.

And last but not least, we need a person who is never satisfied with mediocrity, goal oriented, fearless and hungry for new opportunities to become our navigator in an endless sea of available perspectives.

**Support**
We will share detailed information about our company expertise, service offering and recent projects.

Our team will always support to help you reach your goals. Also, materials that would help you to close a deal will be provided.

We will give you all the resources, materials and professional mentorship you need to be successful. Including training, explanation, clarification and guidance to familiarize yourself with our services to the market, as well as share our passion about them.

**Sounds interesting?**
Put 25% of the deals you close in your pocket. Most of our projects are in the range of £10k to £50k and we’re looking to increase the average basket.

To give you an idea, if you close one £20k deal per month, that’s a £60k annual salary for you. One £50k deal would give you £12,500 in one go.

The higher the involvement, the bigger the income.

**Why Commission?**
We are a very young company and couldn’t afford paying someone that wouldn’t bring results. If you’re good and you believe you can bring in new clients, you’ll get your fair share.

jobs.title: Community Manager (Intern)
jobs.description:
Sparkplug is a London based innovation lab on a mission to provide support for underrepresented groups of technology entrepreneurs and social enterprises in London and the UK.

We assist early stage technology focused founders in building and evolving their business innovations.

Our goals are to help with free product development workshops, free mentoring and building a community of entrepreneurs and experts to gain additional support and access to meet-ups and exclusive events.

We are looking for a talented intern, who can help us build our community for underrepresented groups of technology entrepreneurs and social enterprises in London and the UK. 

This is a part-time intern role as community manager for 3-6 months and an exciting opportunity to grow and structure a startup ecosystem.

As the Community Manager, you’ll be working out of your home or anywhere with WiFi.


**About You:**

* You believe in our mission to build a fairer society by supporting diverse founders and social entrepreneurs into innovative startups

* Self driven

* Social connector, you are the hub of your social world, you know everyone and everyone knows you

* You consider yourself an Influencer


**Responsibilities**

Your role will encompass the following areas:

* **Market research:** Identifying, documenting, and immersing yourself in communities of aspiring technology leaders to discover entrepreneurial talents interested in launching a technology product/startup

* Create the strategy on how to build and engage a community comprising of underrepresented groups of technology entrepreneurs and social enterprises in London and the UK

* Turn the strategy into a plan and execute that plan by creating content, responding to incoming requests and proactively reaching out to the community while communicating our brand and values

* Build and execute a creative outreach program that is impactful and exciting


**Requirement**

* Social media community building

* Communication/storytelling abilities, both written and spoken

* Passion and curiosity for innovation, entrepreneurship and the startup ecosystem

* A willingness to challenge assumptions and learn

* Experience with early-stage startups is a plus


**Benefits**

* We provide all the excitement and freedom of an early stage startup

* **Growth:** Work with and meet exceptional people. Learn faster than you ever have before. Access our network of entrepreneurs and experts

* **Autonomy:** Freedom to execute

* **Support:** We will give you all the resources, materials and professional mentorship you need to be successful. Including training, explanation, clarification and guidance to familiarise yourself with our services to the market, as well as share our passion about them
